dict.acceptation: 早的；早期的；早日的；（果实等）早熟的；

sent.orig: Of influenza patients should be early discovery, early isolation and early treatment.
sent.trans: 对流感病人应早发现、早隔离、早治疗。

sent.orig: I propose an early start/to make an early start/making an early start tomorrow.
Early-warning indexes early-warning intensities are given and an early-warning model based on BP neural network i.
sent.trans: 通过确定预警指标、划分预警警度，建立基于BP人工神经网络的预警模型。

sent.orig: I get up early in order to catch early bus.
sent.trans: 我起床早以便能赶上早班公共汽车。

sent.orig: Mother told her son to start out early and start back early.
sent.trans: 母亲告诉儿子早去早回。
